name: SRI.M. RAJAGOPALAN CHITRA EDUCATIONAL SOCIAL AND DIVINEï¿½TRUST
briefDescription: “SRI.M. RAJAGOPALAN-CHITRA EDUCATIONAL SOCIAL AND DIVINE TRUST”, is a registered Voluntary Social Service organization and working for the rural poorest of the poor people. The down-trodden, the oppressed, the suppressed needy people community and society in our target area of operation for the last 03 years. We are also availed 12AA order as Charity from the Government of India.       "MRC TRUST" has been to the down-trodden rural poor people according to our abilities and possibilities for the last 03 years to the needy people of our target are. At present we are seeking funding and Fundraising for our Noble Projects and programs implementation to our area needy people, community and society.
